body_html: @angersson according to me frozen graph should be platform independent but in this case it is not. Also creating graph from check point on another machine is giving different results. It should be addressed as a bug instead of installation or environment problem. I have tried t2, p2, m5 instances built tensorflow with GPU and non GPU support. Graph is working fine on raspberry pi tensorflow build from source.

body: @angersson according to me frozen graph should be platform independent but in this case it is not. Also creating graph from check point on another machine is giving different results. It should be addressed as a bug instead of installation or environment problem. I have tried t2, p2, m5 instances built tensorflow with GPU and non GPU support. Graph is working fine on raspberry pi tensorflow build from source.
